messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] cooking show
messages.msgSnippet: He s adorable! My almost-4 year old watched it with me and I think he s inspired now.  I need to get a food processor... I was struggling with figuring out how
messages.messageBody:
He's adorable! My almost-4 year old watched it with me and I think
he's inspired now. I need to get a food processor... I was struggling
with figuring out how to make more cooking things safe for my son, and
that's a great idea.

And I have that same apron... it fits me a little different. LOL

Bekki

--
"Do not ask what the world needs. Instead, ask what makes you come
alive. Because what the world needs is more people who have come
alive."

--Thurmond Whitman

Mother of four angels and two pirates
Kayla (10)
Hunter (b. 8/9/03, d. 8/22/03)
Jo (misc 1/15/04)
Jared (3)
Camelia (b. 12/16/07, d. 12/10/07)
Hope/Chance (misc 11/25/08)

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] cooking show
messages.msgSnippet: My daughter and I heard an interview with this little boy and his Mom on NPR while we were driving in the car....after the interview, we looked at each
messages.messageBody:
My daughter and I heard an interview with this little boy and his Mom on NPR while we were driving in the car....after the interview, we looked at each other and both said, "I bet they're unschoolers!"  
Beth in MA 




________________________________
From: Rue Kream <skreams@...>
To: Unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, January 7, 2009 1:27:35 PM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] cooking show


I watched a cooking show I really liked this morning. Ends up the host
is an unschooler.

http://www.oregonli ve.com/portland/ index.ssf/ 2008/12/post_ 2.html

~Rue

messages.messageBody:
>I watched a cooking show I really liked this morning. Ends up the host
>is an unschooler.
>http://www.oregonlive.com/portland/index.ssf/2008/12/post_2.html


How awesomely fun! While reading the article I ran across his mom's name,
and only then realized who he is and that I met his family at the LIFE is
Good unschooling conference last Memorial Day.
http://www.lifeisgoodconference.com/


His mom Kristen's blog is here:
http://kristenmckee.wordpress.com/



-=b.



--
Brad in Boulder, CO
http://holcombs.org
